messages.message:
Hi all -- we are proposing removing Bazel and switching to language-native tools across the board. The details (including pro/con analysis) are here. (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KQ4PPe2P8iiPO5s5s-TO6vy1FVf3D5IeFeuexNRV2Ec/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.b1lxop1psw7b) Note that the migration plan at the end of the doc is not finalized.

If you have strong objections, please respond ASAP -- we are going to make a decision on this proposal this week. Ty!

<!channel>
